  freestar.config = freestar.config || {};

        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="78575" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="78575" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.51</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="3215">3,215</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="398"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Invictus Victory Elixir</b> by <b>Rabanne</b> is a Oriental Woody fragrance for men. This is a new fragrance. <b>Invictus Victory Elixir</b> was launched in 2023. Top notes are Lavender, Cardamom and Black Pepper; middle notes are Incense and Patchouli; base notes are Vanilla Pod and Tonka Bean. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>Discover <strong>Invictus Victory Elixir</strong>, the pinnacle of Invictus intensity.The new powerful mens fragrance by Paco Rabanne.A powerful elixir that transcends all boundaries.Now is the time to experience your moment of immortality.A rich, powerful and long-lasting fragrance composed of spicy woods and intense freshness.The fragrance for absolute winners.The ultimate expression of victory.Never stop winning!</p>

<p>The new fragrancereveals its true nature with its intense blue to black lacquered bottle.The imposing central golden V is the deciding factor.</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: </fragram-photos-wrapper><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-y" id="pyramid"><div class="cell"><div style="display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; text-align: center; background: white;"><div class="strike-title"><span>Perfume Pyramid</span></div><pyramid-switch :perfume_id="78575"><pyramid-notes title="Main Notes According to Your Votes"></pyramid-notes><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Top Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="top"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.83555498052084; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.1.jpg" style="width: 2.95rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Lavender-1.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Lavender</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.82046435076082; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.63.jpg" style="width: 2.875rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Cardamom-63.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Cardamom</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.75364609430049; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.158.jpg" style="width: 2.575rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Pepper-158.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Black Pepper</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Middle Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="middle"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.85008085084786; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.68.jpg" style="width: 3.025rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Incense-68.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Incense</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.73508893593265; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.34.jpg" style="width: 2.5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Patchouli-34.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Patchouli</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; flex-direction: row; padding: 0.5rem;"><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.74.jpg" style="width: 5rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Vanilla-74.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Vanilla Pod</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 1; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.73.jpg" style="width: 4.125rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Tonka-Bean-73.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Tonka Bean</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="78575"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='0f3331aeaad022a784f8992d3fea537b397' slotpayload='{"ct":"FAhapYpprRatTl9ZzGYT0CuSKEBmv6F+cQGaZhYaJceWcc\/eJz1hpAKdD07lWWwQ2E2vViGn2crcFqfLDb07WNeLBgZbyIlkbtKT87F9HBmC8n9CtQj0qseaiCp9ukvP9mrdfY+WBeQ8DEq4JYdNo16BuCmDfRLZK46NKyCEoxm9WFaYFWm4X4KspfOUc2PLGuSHR4YbNSfK9TpwPNEUgnETXWYaXGkgPr3i5X\/m8aMV03RsEh8gOAxmirD9vFVv3BSUQugfauutiFAJxE6rpS\/ng8ftD5QZCYERXH3qexvh8oDvb9UFfi\/2P8niYL6X","iv":"8ba6d1e96fac5caa048c534cd48a6f34","s":"6258eaacbc17752b"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->

height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></dislike><span class="show-for-medium">Negative Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#search-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><i class="fas fa-search"></i><span class="show-for-medium">Search</span></a></li></ul><reviews-wrapper><div class="tabs-content" data-tabs-content="deeplinked-tabs"><div class="tabs-panel is-active" id="all-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2371629" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2371629" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PabloSmellGood"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2348926"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="PabloSmellGood" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2371629ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2371629" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2348926">PabloSmellGood</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-12-05"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1733409305" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just created my account to say how INSANE this thing is!!<br />
I sprayed 5 times at 12pm and now at 6pm, it is still projecting like a BEAST<br />
Got several compliments today and definitely will wear it more often</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2371629"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2371629#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2366248" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2366248" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fernando-txs"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2239057"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="fernando-txs" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2366248ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2366248" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2239057">fernando-txs</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-30">11/30/24 12:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I went to Sephora, I had this on my wishlist I compared on 2 arms my most wanted colognes at the moment, azzaro the most wanted parfum, swy Intensely, spicebomb extreme and this invictus victory elixir edp, and this one outperforms all of the, sileage, projection, duration and best scent out of all of them it's been more than 12 hours already and my arms I can barely slightly smell it and my shirt still has the same invictus elixir smell this is a must have... I'm still saving for it probably until Christmas but I'll definitely buy the full bottle.. the aroma is sooo addicting so easy to like, and has it all projection, sileage and seems to be a compliment magnet so easy to like-love it..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; One of the best winter fragrances out there without looking at the price. If price is an issue, Azzaro The Most Wanted EDP/Parfum is just as good with slightly less longevity, but they perform very similar overall. been my daily since the beginning of fall and pulls compliments like no other.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2354269" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Chrispy83"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2328797"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2328797.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Chrispy83" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2354269ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2354269" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2328797">Chrispy83</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-19">11/19/24 09:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I absolutely love this, the incense smell is something I grew to love when I tried Dior Homme Sport and this is a beast cold weather night time scent that got me tons of compliments from friends and strangers. Lasts a very long time and can smell it on your skin even when you wake up in the morning. Its not too sweet like some of those who say below me, bc I dont like super sweet smells on me. They get annoying, for whatever reason the notes in this compliment very well with the incense and feel classy yet playful and seductive. Not too sweet but sweet enough. This is easily my second favorite scent and would not get rid of this one any time soon. This for me is a 10/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2354269"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2354269#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2353291" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353291" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="robbybred"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809287"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="robbybred" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353291ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353291" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1809287">robbybred</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 13:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Rather disappointing couple of decades from Paco Rabanne in my view.<br />
Too sweet to my taste, a lots of spices compressed and pressurized within one bottle.<br />
Too much Vanilla for a male fragrance , lavender Bac round give it rather cheap freshener like and id say vulgarism character. Cannot honestly recommend it to anyone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2353291"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2353291#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2353058" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353058" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rsnero680"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2024694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rsnero680" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353058ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353058" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024694">rsnero680</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 09:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>@Sacheen You are aware that when you're wearing a smell, you get noseblind to it right? Like how chronic smokers don't smell the tobacco smoke but everyone around them does. This doesn't mean your fragrance isn't performing.<br />
This shit is nuclear and overspraying it will cause everyone around you to be miserable.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2353058"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2353058#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2353042" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2353042" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sacheen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2327536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2327536.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sacheen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2353042ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2353042" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2327536">Sacheen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18">11/18/24 09:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I didn't like when I smelled it first. Later it grew on me as the weather started getting cooler. Thanks to the vanilla and coconut notes. Someone at a coffee shop even said I smelled very sexy! <br />
Having said that, when I bought this "Elixir" perfume, I expected it to last minimum 6-8 hours before I had to reapply given its supposed higher concentration of perfume oil. However, it left me gutted as it started to become skin scent after an hour despite macerating it. Nope, thanks! I am going back to Middle Eastern fragrances where I get what I pay for.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2353042"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2353042#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2352369" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; There is almost a coconut tropical freshness in the opening with that creamy vanilla. And then the smoke and patchouli comes out. The performance is actually insane. I sprayed it on my hoodie two days ago and i can still smell it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2351660"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2351660#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2351611" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2351611" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mohamed_rashwan99"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2317373"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2317373.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mohamed_rashwan99" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2351611ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2351611" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2317373">mohamed_rashwan99</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-17">11/17/24 00:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love it</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2351611"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2351611#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2350786" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2350786" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RokinRandy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221674"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2221674.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RokinRandy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Guerlain/L-Homme-Ideal-Eau-de-Parfum-37735.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37735.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"title="LHomme Ideal Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2350786ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2350786" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2221674">RokinRandy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-16">11/16/24 05:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ever smell something that made you smile ?!?  Longevity ?   Trust me its there when you cant tell.  Its eternal.  <br />
<br />
These elixirs are a trip at first.  Reminded me of  2 or 3 different colognes on the first spray from a fresh bottle.  <br />
First initial spray didnt smell much different than Boss the scent elixir.  I Guess some air had to get in and do its magic and open it up.   After a few hours it transformed to that fruity invictus Dna in elixir format.   This is sooooo damned good.   <br />
<br />
My Dad says is this mine ?  So unlike my Dad.   So I had to buy another bottle He is 90 yrs old. <br />
<br />
First spray out the bottle.  I even had to spray Boss The scent elixir and invictus side by side to check.   Showed the wife.  Even She said that it is not too much different than Boss scent elixers.    They are so different.   But it was just that fresh spray .  <br />
<br />
As  It dried it even started to remind me of le beau one Time.   Oooh its a very nice Vanilla on the verge of being a coconut. That vanilla pod they use    So glad it is not coconut.   Big smile.  <br />
<br />
Ok its time To reset the nose here.  <br />
<br />
And after a few hours the air that meets the sprayer goes to work.  The notes open up.   And there is no doubt it shares the same invictus Dna we all know as that famous  fruity profile and Its as simple as that.  It just had to develop .    But yea.  Definitely Invictus !!!!<br />
<br />
People have said it smells like this or that and I dont get any of it after you let it age a few hours after first spray.   Such a fresh batch.  But   It smells like Invictus ! Thats all !<br />
<br />
 If you like Hawas and Hayaati by Lattafa then youll love this as well imho.   Those are just slightly more diluted or whatever give or take.   Still the  same dna.  Yes there is that heavy elixir vanilla thing going on that gives off like a slight Le Beau vibe.  And it makes me happy.  <br />
<br />
The  Wife said its all starting to smell just alike.   Lol <br />
Because it is The same invictus dna that we all know and love that is found in Hawas or Hayaati.  <br />
In elixir form.   I have all that in the bathroom so she knows it.  <br />
<br />
Ofcourse you get a better version of it in elixir form.  I dont think its redundant . It will damn sure get used.  This is the best Invictus out of all of them.  <br />
<br />
Now  if you were to get the most out of Invictus  this would have to be it . <br />
Might as well get a 6.8 ounce for the best value its an addictive scent . <br />
<br />
I will hate running out.   Glad I got a big bottle..</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2350786"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2350786#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2347993" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Great longevity. My Coat has Tuxedo remnants, this layered on top smelt amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2347993"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2347993#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346669" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346669" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="bschlueter"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2280626"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="bschlueter" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Maison-Crivelli/Tubereuse-Astrale-90733.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.90733.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tubreuse Astrale"title="Tubreuse Astrale"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346669ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346669" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2280626">bschlueter</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 13:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I blind bought this and my first impression when I smelled the opening was "what is this shit" but after revisiting it a few days later I start to like it more and more and I'd prefer it over SB extreme as my go-to winter scent. Performance is decent, not weak (stronger than Terre d'Hermes EDT and Essencia EDP) but also not too strong (weaker than Arabians Tonka / Tuberose Astrale)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2346669"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2346669#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2344519" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I never was a fan of the Invictus bottle design but I really like this fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2344519"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2344519#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2339351" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2337994" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dark Owl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1419042"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1419042.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dark Owl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2337994ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2337994" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1419042">Dark Owl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-04">11/04/24 13:15</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The cons: If you don't like the modern sweet style (JPG Scandal &amp; Le Beau lines, Valentino Uomo Born in Roma line, Armani SWY line or even the Invictus (and 1 Million) lines in general) you surely aren't going to like this one either.  *also quite expensive. <br />
<br />
The pros: It's superbly done for what it is, a sweet modern fragrance which at least in my opinion has some layers to it, at least early on there is a fruity, almost citrus-like or pineapple scent (Le Beau?!) to it along with the sweetness. It's fairly strong and long-lasting too.  Yet another flanker (of a flanker?!) but it is expertly done in my opinion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2337994"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2337994#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2337201" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; definitely put your nose on this before purchasing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2337201"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2337201#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335436" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2335436" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Giordy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294372"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1294372.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Giordy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2335436ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2335436" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1294372">Giordy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-02">11/02/24 06:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This opening is very very good. The lavender in the opening gives this a nice aromatique quality.<br />
I've seen people say that they get a mint in the opening, i think its just how the lavender is blended here, its just very nicely done!<br />
<br />
This amazig opening maybe lasts for 15min (1 spray on hand to test this). After that the patchouli, vanilla and tonka bean are the prominent notes to my nose, its still very nice, but indd something you might have smelled before.<br />
<br />
Overal its a good release, smells good and has very good performance. I think the dna is very likeable cause i got some compliments already in the first 2 days of testing this. <br />
<br />
I for sure give it 8.5/10. if it was more unique it would score higher.<br />
Just a save bet maybe to make your elixir a strong fragrance with a dna you know people gonna like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2335436"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2335436#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2333083" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2069993">FragSim</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-18">10/18/24 00:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an incredibly masculine fragrance which actually took me by shock. I get a lot of coconut in the opening which then fades after about 20 minutes then i just get vanilla incense with tonka bean and it is honestly magestic. I would call it the older brother of Le beau le parfum as it is more mature smelling but they a similar DNA. I get 10 hours of longevity with this and 3 hours projection of about 5 feet. i think you can wear this all year round. i get many compliments with it too from both boys and women</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
