Perfect for winter and autumn, decent for summer and spring, can get cloying if you sweat alot. 9/10, i love vanilla!!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2314017"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2314017#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312593" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mondee_"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256441"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1256441.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mondee_" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Imagination-67370.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67370.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Imagination"title="Imagination"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312593ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312593" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1256441">Mondee_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 15:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorite scents as a teenager was AXE Excite. Ive always wanted a fragrance like it and I finally found it. This a surprise as Im not a big fan of the Invictus line, but this is amazing. In my rotation for life, I really hope PR doesnt discontinue this anytime soon. Big LOVE from me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2312593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2312593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312257" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312257" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="caifan"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/939475"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.939475.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="caifan" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hugo-Boss/Boss-The-Scent-Private-Accord-50874.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.50874.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Boss The Scent Private Accord"title="Boss The Scent Private Accord"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312257ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312257" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/939475">caifan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 10:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Invictus Victory Elixir is a vanilla, spicy and aromatic fragrance.<br />
<br />
Its opening smells of slightly burnt or smoky vanilla, probably due to the use of incense and spices such as black pepper. This initial phase smells very good and is very attractive. As time goes by, you can perceive a slightly powdery lavender and something curious is that as the aroma develops, I begin to smell some fruity accords, as if the development were the other way around, since it is more common to smell citrus or fruits. at the opening of the fragrance. Several hours later the smell that remains is vanilla and slightly spicy.<br />
<br />
For me it is a fragrance exclusively for night use, or during the day on cool autumn or winter days, with a youthful taste until mature age.<br />
<br />
Its longevity is very good, it stayed with me for more than 8 hours. with a moderate sillage.<br />
<br />
The smell of Invictus Victory Elixir is very pleasant, I liked it a lot, I could almost recommend buying it blindly if you like fragrances like Le Male Le Parfum or Le Male Elixir, but in my case it is that I live in an area of Mexico where it is hotter than cold all year round and I have to choose carefully which fragrances I buy to use in that climate, but this can be a good choice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2312257"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2312257#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309871" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309871" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Celico"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2013065"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Celico" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Lover-89720.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89720.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Lover"title="Le Male Lover"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309871ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309871" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2013065">Celico</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 06:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It's way too sweet and synthetic for me. The worst part is that it smells straight up bad on my skin. Like tar almost. Completely different than on paper. Smell wise I prefer the normal Invictus Victory.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2309871"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2309871#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2309420" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2309420" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="otteromkram"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302803"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1302803.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="otteromkram" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nishane/Hacivat-44174.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44174.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hacivat"title="Hacivat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2309420ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2309420" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1302803">otteromkram</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 19:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Adding another comment to note the atomizer (sprayer). <br />
<br />
This is my first Invictus and, while the bottle looks a little goofy (just my opinion, btw), it's like the development team took whatever design they used for the 1 Million sprayers and did the opposite.<br />
<br />
Each spritz is a controlled, tactile delight; the product goes where you expect and isn't calibrated to douse you in scented liquid.  <br />
<br />
(Note: If you like that kind of thing, DM me. I know some people.) <br />
<br />
Probably one of the best atomizer I've used and the fact that it's coupled to a wonderful fragrance is probably one of the best experiences a human could have in their lifetime.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2309420"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2309420#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2303241" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2303241" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mefegurkas"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194264"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2194264.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mefegurkas" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2303241ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2303241" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2194264">mefegurkas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 03:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>its my signature scent, got it like a week ago and fell in love with it. i was a little bit scared while buying it, because invictus series always be watery and fresh but at cooldown it turns into a masculine cold weather scent. yes, it is sweet and powdery but it doesn't smell like a female scent. masculine, perfect for fall season.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2303241"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2303241#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2302284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2302284" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="SOScents"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2273657.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="SOScents" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Allure-Homme-Sport-Eau-Extreme-14669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"title="Allure Homme Sport Eau Extreme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2302284ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2302284" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273657">SOScents</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-02">10/02/24 07:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Ive never been a fan of the Invictus line other than the very first release, I always found them very boring and a waste of money! <br />
<br />
BUT<br />
<br />
I thought Id give this one a try and duty free and my god was I blown away this the scent profile, performance and the price!! I managed to pick this up for around 60 for 50ml which I think is a fair price! <br />
<br />
The opening is my least favourite part of the frag as it reminds me of Lynx/Axe Dark Temptation, but once it dried down it became something more exciting! <br />
Almost like Paco Rabannes take on a winter version of JPG Le Beau. So if you like that, then youll love this for sure! <br />
<br />
Performance is also fantastic as I had a solid 7/8hrs out of it and even more on clothes. <br />
<br />
Well done PR, youve finally released another great invictus frag </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2302284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2302284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2300167" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2300167" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Brokenz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2265336"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Brokenz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Rabanne/1-Million-Elixir-71708.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71708.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="1 Million Elixir"title="1 Million Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2300167ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2300167" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2265336">Brokenz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-30">09/30/24 10:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Idk for you all but if make for cloud when walk and more aromatic like 3-4 meters from you, that will be 10/10 I love this one and this is vanilla! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2300167"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2300167#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2296516" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2296516" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheDogfatherHTX"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1824841.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheDogfatherHTX" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Initio-Parfums-Prives/Oud-for-Greatness-Neo-93090.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93090.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud for Greatness Neo"title="Oud for Greatness Neo"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2296516ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2296516" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824841">TheDogfatherHTX</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-27">09/27/24 00:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When speaking of the Invictus line, there are a few that stand out in terms of amount of hype received; Victory Elixir is one of them. Everyone sings its praises and I haven't heard a single person say something negative about it. Admittedly, I am not a huge follower of the Invictus line. I love my Invictus Aqua bottles, and I really enjoyed the fresh greens from Invictus Platinum, but Invictus Intense left me disappointed and I've only tested the OG; never worn it. That being said, I know what kind of scents I gravitate towards; and if the note breakdown is accurate then I should love this one. Let's get into it;<br />
<br />
Scent:<br />
Opening is warm spicy, sweet, and aromatic. The primary notes I get are vanilla, tonka bean, incense, and lavender. The strongest of the notes are the vanilla and tonka. The vanilla is sweet and creamy, somewhere in between synthetic and realistic. The tonka bean doubles down on the sweetness while lending its signature powdery accord. This is followed by the incense and lavender. The incense offers a spicy and smokey accord that exudes masculinity and reminds me of an actual burning stick of scented incense, while the lavender lingers in the background with its typical floral aromatics. I also get a distinct nutty quality in the opening that I can't determine the origin of; it could be just the way the opening notes work together but it's definitely noticeable to me. There's a bit of the black pepper in the back as well to add a little more spice. The dry down is still sweet, warm spicy, and aromatic. The primary notes are still vanilla, tonka bean, incense, and lavender. The dry down is similar to the opening but there are some noticeable differences; namely the lavender is more subtle, the incense has become smokier, the black pepper is gone, and the patchouli has made an appearance in the background to lend some sweet earthiness. Other than that, the vanilla and tonka are still the main players and there's still that nutty accord that I can't place. At certain points throughout the life of the fragrance I was able to pick up whiffs of the Invictus DNA somewhere in there, but it's largely a pretty marked departure from the rest of the Invictus line. In all honesty, it reminds me more of something I'd find in the 1 Million line.<br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Initial projection is nuclear and can easily fill a room. The sillages matches that intensity with a scent trail that cannot be missed. After a few hours the projection was about 3-4 feet and the scent trail was noticeable. At around the 7 hour mark the projection was about arms length and there was still a slight scent trail. The fragrance became a skin scent around hour 9.<br />
<br />
When to wear:<br />
This is a fall/winter scent most suited for evening wear. It's warm, cozy, and matches the seasons perfectly. This would be a bit too strong for office wear, but would work great as a date night fragrance. I wouldn't pick it for anything formal, though as it's too sweet and "flirty".<br />
<br />
Blind buy:<br />
If you like the 1 Million line of fragrances, or you like sweet and warm vanillic fragrances in general, this is a safe blind buy for you.<br />
<br />
Final verdict:<br />
From opening to dry down I love the scent profile of Victory Elixir. Warm, sweet vanilla with some smokiness and a touch of aromatics is right up my alley. The performance was right on par with what others have said; it lasted a good while and projected well. I don't really have anything negative to say about this fragrance to be honest. The only improvement could have been to the performance just a bit to push it into eternal/nuclear territory, but that's just nitpicking. I would confidently recommend this to any man as an excellent addition to their fall/winter rotation. If you like this type of DNA you should pick this one up while it's at a decent price.<br />
<br />
Scent: 10/10<br />
Longevity: 8/10<br />
Sillage: 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2296516"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2296516#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2292198" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2292198" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Zattark"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1704051"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1704051.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Zattark" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2292198ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2292198" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1704051">Zattark</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-23">09/23/24 03:51</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The scent has really grown on me. Its got this fizzy like vanilla sweetness which I really like mixed the small amount of incense. Signiture scent worthy 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2292198"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2292198#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284592" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284592" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="devinopepino"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2255961"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="devinopepino" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284592ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284592" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2255961">devinopepino</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-16">09/16/24 08:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is my first ever review of a fragrance. I literally just made my account to do this review its that good lol. <br />
<br />
When I first smelled this on the tester strip at Macys I was instantly in love. WOW! I had been searching for a sweet fragrance and I had just recently gifted a bottle of JPG Le Male Elixir to my father and I was debating getting a small bottle of my own IVE (invictus victory elixir) was not on my radar AT ALL. The girl behind the counter was and wasnt sure what to recommend, I was a babys hair away from buying Invictus Victor and calling it a day, we have a gift box for invictus victory elixir, if you want to smell it? She said as she put the box on the table. Sure, Ill take a smell. She sprayed the strip and upon first sniff I couldnt help but smile and feel all giddy like a schoolgirl. It was AMAZING! <br />
Sweet vanilla, but it has a freshness and a slight fruit vibe that I cant quite place. Its got this pleasant aromatic smell that is very attractive. It doesnt evolve or change much, it starts off sweet, slightly fresh and aromatic. And it ends with that sweet vanilla and tonka bean. Pretty basic stuff actually, but damn its sexy! I put two sprays today for work, one inside my left elbow and one behind my neck. I had several coworkers come and stand significantly closer than usual to me. One of the girls during a meeting came and stood right next to my left elbow and started STRETCHING and LEANING over around in front and next to me. I have no reason to lie, I swear to you. You have been warned. <br />
This fragrance starts off VERY SWEET and very strong. When I first started testing wearing this I put four sprays and almost killed myself. Its that strong and projecting, seriously. If you dont want to be THAT GUY thats annihilating  everyones nose, I recommend 2-3 sprays max. Ive even done 1 spray behind the neck and ran errands and I can smell it all day long. On clothes its damn near eternal, I have a shirt that i didnt even spray directly and it STILL SMELLS like IVE. Ive found two sprays to be my sweet spot. People notice when I walk past or within a smallish radius, but Im not blasting everyones olfactory with vanilla sweetness. Its noticed, not announced. <br />
<br />
I give this fragrance a 10/10 for a sweet aromatic. <br />
It doesnt do anything crazy different, but what it does it does REALLY FREAKING WELL. For how long it lasts and how little you need to use smell great all day, I say its a steal. Devinopepino out, god bless.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2284592"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2284592#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2284135" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2284135" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Cinnabomb"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496507"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1496507.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Cinnabomb" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/L-Homme-Cologne-Bleue-48308.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48308.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="LHomme Cologne Bleue"title="LHomme Cologne Bleue"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2284135ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2284135" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1496507">Cinnabomb</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-15">09/15/24 19:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've been wearing this for a few days now and trying to figure out why it seems so familiar to me. Underneath the vanilla and sweetness I think there is a mineralic, salty, aquatic hint that evokes ADG Profondo. <br />
It's that fresh undertone that allows it to be sweet without necessarily becoming cloying, and as such can be worn in warmer (but not hot) weather. <br />
I haven't had good luck with Paco Rabanne fragrances, so I'm very pleasantly surprised by Victory Elixir. It's very wearable and crowd-pleasing, long-lasting with decent projection.  I don't find it especially synthetic - others are much more so IMHO (looking at you, Most Wanted Parfum).</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2284135"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2284135#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2282788" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; That should say something, especially coming from a designer. A creamy incensed coconut with vanilla thats topped off with a hint of spicyness/earthiness due to the pepper and patchouli. Its thick but also projects heavenly and will last for hours and hours. Beautiful fragrance that I will be picking up A LOT this fall and winter then will continue to wear into spring!! The versatility is great too, you will smell amazing at a formal event or just for a daily wear at work. I fw this heavy  much love to you all</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2282440"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2282440#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2279031" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; smell - 8/10<br />
longevity - 9/10<br />
projection - 8/10<br />
<br />
overall - 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2279031"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2279031#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275522" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2275522" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FrogLog"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2203922"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2203922.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FrogLog" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2275522ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2275522" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2203922">FrogLog</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-08">09/08/24 00:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>First 30 minutes are an immense olfactory pleasure. <br />
<br />
Pepper, cardamom, and incense combo makes a handsome and intelligent fragrance. Thick, rich, creamy, warm spice. It smells really freaking good. <br />
<br />
Then, for the next 12 hours (days on clothing), its sweet vanilla, vanilla, vanilla, vanilla. Too sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2275522"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2275522#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2275034" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1666681">Maanijan</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-01">09/01/24 03:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you like fresh coco Lav , sweet vanilla Tonka, and spice black pepp than this is best. <br />
Nuclear performer all day long with huge compliment pulling factor. All you need is 1 spray max 2.<br />
Only downside may be too common now, as this kind of formulation has been tried by other houses too.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2267850"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2267850#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2264304" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2264304" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="camp1nhoM"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2162239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2162239.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="camp1nhoM" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2264304ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2264304" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2162239">camp1nhoM</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-28">08/28/24 20:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a ever so slightly more mature take on this popular gourmand scent trend. I pick up mainly vanilla, caramel (very similar to the one found in Scandal) and a hint of mint. This vanilla/caramel combo is the thing that could make you think of a creamy coconut note sometimes, which probably is why is compared to Le Beau Le Parfum. I would say is redundant to own this and LBLP or Scandal as they have some similarities and would be used on the same scenarios, just pick your favourite from this type os scent. I prefer this over Scandal but not over LBLP. Performance on this one is excellent though, I would say even better than LBLP. Overall pretty solid.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2264304"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2264304#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2261422" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2255629" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Giuliano1"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2227721"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2227721.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Giuliano1" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2255629ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2255629" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2227721">Giuliano1</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-20">08/20/24 17:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Overall, it's a great fragrance. It has really good projection and is very long-lasting, even more so when sprayed on clothes. It has strong scents of vanilla, tobacco, tonka bean, and just a touch of lavender. However, you should only wear it on cold days because of its sweetness. 8.7/10.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2255629"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2255629#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253559" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2253559" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="finfragrance"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2190219"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2190219.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="finfragrance" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Le-Male-Elixir-81642.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.81642.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Le Male Elixir"title="Le Male Elixir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2253559ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2253559" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2190219">finfragrance</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-18">08/18/24 16:22</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorite fragrances, its rich, sweet, tropical and fresh. Lots of depth and character for a vanilla heavy fragrance. Performs great, and the dry down is amazing. Easy to like and even easier to love. I get almost a coconut type note after dry down, and its amazing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2253559"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2253559#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2253131" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2253131" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="willthiel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1497092"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="willthiel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2253131ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2253131" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1497092">willthiel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-18">08/18/24 07:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I tried it in Sephora 5 days ago and the incense note in it was gorgeous. Bought a decant to further test it before buying and the incense is nowhere to be found. What is going on?</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2253131"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2253131#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2245268" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2245268" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pr3ttysus"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992578"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1992578.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pr3ttysus" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Yves-Saint-Laurent/Y-Le-Parfum-64718.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.64718.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Y Le Parfum"title="Y Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2245268ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2245268" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1992578">Pr3ttysus</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-10">08/10/24 16:14</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This isn't gourmand sweet like 1 million elixir. This has a much darker spice heavy approach, with sweetness in the dry down. If you love spicy get this, but if you love sweet get 1 million elixir.<br />
<br />
ALSO, this is a fall winter fragrance. Please do not wear this in summer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2245268"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2245268#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2243098" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2243098" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JefteVS"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2006771"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2006771.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JefteVS" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2243098ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2243098" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2006771">JefteVS</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-08">08/08/24 15:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am going to start this review off saying that this fragrance was one of the most complimented by the ladies in my whole collection. This is my dumb reach whenever I know that I will be in the presence of any beautiful senoritas because of the sensual sweetness associated with this fragrance. The tonka bean is immaculate, and the way it dances with the Patchouli and vanilla on my skin is what makes it so appealing. Projection and longevity are extremely strong, and that is expected knowing Paco Rabbane, it just manages to appear on all night long. Copped the 200 ml, so I know that I have a fragrance for life. I would absolutely recommend!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2243098"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2243098#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2237145" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2236013"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2236013#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2233198" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2233198" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="eliseoo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757132"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757132.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="eliseoo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Fahrenheit-Le-Parfum-23099.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23099.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"title="Fahrenheit Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2233198ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2233198" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757132">eliseoo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-29">07/29/24 19:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So either Rabanne has horrid quality control issues, or I'm just incredibly unlucky.<br />
My first bottle was from macys, all the notes were present, this was a nuclear powerhouse coming off my skin, synthetic (in the best possible way) potent vanilla, fresh top notes, with prominent incense at the base, it was a masterpiece.<br />
<br />
Returned it because fragbuy had it for a lot less, but i missed the scent and went to a sephora to smell it again.. what happened? All I smelled was a buttery vanilla, no fresh top notes, no incense, no nothing but a buttery vanilla, I actually kinda hated it, I was like okay, maybe just a bad bottle.<br />
<br />
Got my bottle from fragbuy and this was just botched too, my first bottle was so potent that if I sprayed twice in the same spot and sniffed it for too long i got a headache, however this was the complete opposite, sprayed it around 15 times in the same spot and it was equivalent to a half spray of my first bottle, on top of that, all the notes were toned down by like 10x. They let me return it.<br />
<br />
My first bottle was produced early 2024, my second bottle was produced september 2023 (32691), couldnt see batch code for sephora tester. This is just a warning that you might not be getting the same performance/scent as other people. So if you get this fragrance at its peak, it is an amazing mens designer vanilla scent.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2233198"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2233198#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229906" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229906" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FragSim"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2069993"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="FragSim" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Tom-Ford/Tobacco-Vanille-1825.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1825.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Tobacco Vanille"title="Tobacco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229906ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229906" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2069993">FragSim</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-26">07/26/24 07:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells absolutely amazing! You get a loud blast of something that smells like coconut (similar to the opening of the le beau or le beau le parfum) which may be a little off putting but once youre through that phase which last about 5 minutes you starts to pick up on the vanilla,lavender and sexy dose of incense. This fragrances dry down is extremely sexy and is guaranteed to get compliments while wearing this fragrance!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2229906"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2229906#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2229074" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2229074" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="richthenfamous"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1076303"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1076303.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="richthenfamous" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2229074ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2229074" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1076303">richthenfamous</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-25">07/25/24 09:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It opens up spicy and sweet, with a fruity sparkling type of smell that makes the opening just amazing. As i said earlier i don't smell any coconut, but more a creamy tonka and vanilla combination that's really smooth. When it reaches the mid and dry down it's mainly vanilla with a faint incense and patchouli which gives this a interesting dry down.<br />
<br />
Performance is 10/10, the projection is very potent. Someone told me they could smell me 20 Meters away, this was 5/6 hours after spraying and yes i had oversprayed but that's insane for being so many hours after. Longevity is up to par with Le Male Elixir, Le male goes maybe a couple hours more but that doesn't matter when they both last 12+ hours on my skin. The sillage is very good too, leaves an incredible scent trail and stays in the room after you leave.<br />
<br />
In the middle of summer I'm wearing this and it's amazing, this fragrance made me realize that it doesn't matter what you wear in what season just wear it with confidence. Gotten me plenty of compliments so it's definitely a very mass appealing scent just spray accordingly.<br />
<br />
10/10 definitely recommend.<br />
I'm gonna buy the 200ML soon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2229074"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2229074#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2227190" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2224521" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ozymandyias"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570374"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="ozymandyias" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2224521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2224521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1570374">ozymandyias</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-20">07/20/24 13:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Kind of ironic how the designer market is flooded with Invictus clones, while the original Invictus line has evolved in a surprisingly good direction. <br />
<br />
This is a straight up gourmand scent scent with hints of caramel but mostly a very good vanilla.<br />
<br />
I wouldn't purchase it as I'm not that into sweet perfumes, but if you're a gourmand lover this is definitely worth checking out!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2134777">Koolthisshit2222</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-12">07/12/24 04:45</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its my favorite vanilla heavy fregrence, even tho i dont like vanilla and tonka that much this is perfect, vanilla sweatness balanced with patchouli and black pepper, first hour is super mature and creamy but drydown is jus this insainly strong vanilla and tonka, transition is super smooth jus like the whole fregrence, it lasts me 13+ hours just from 4 sprays and fills up entire room, but the patchouli note is very polarising, sum ppl love it (like me) or hate it. Its also not that expensive for the quality ur getting.<br />
<br />
9/10 <br />
<br />
Patchouli cloud be more intense bc its beautiful in this colonge</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2216185"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2216185#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2215571" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2215428" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yousmellsexyy"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191657"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="yousmellsexyy" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2215428ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2215428" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2191657">yousmellsexyy</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-11">07/11/24 11:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of the sexiest perfumes in the PR Invictus collection, I really like the dry down which is sweet and the projection is good for the first 2 hours. You can smell it and it lasts on the skin for 4-5 hours. I have very complicated skin chemistry, so I feel it vanished or maybe I got nose blind. On clothes, it can be smelled even after days. So far, I haven't received any compliments but let's see down the line. I like all the notes of this perfume better than other collections. Go for this if you like sweet fragrances with a masculine touch.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2215428"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2215428#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2211534" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
