padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1469763">crystalbrosas</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-08">07/08/24 01:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree with the other reviews here that it smells like pia colada, with a hint of smokiness on the drydown because of the incense. I tried this with JPG Le Beau Le Parfum and yes it smells similar. But I prefer this one cause it's like a "darker" version of Le Beau and it didn't give me headaches LOL. Not sure with others but this can also be a daytime and summer fragrance as well since it smells like a luxury tropical island resort vibe to me. Strong projection and longevity!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2211534"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2211534#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2206946" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is a classic designer vanilla fragrance, but it does have some aromatics that make it a little interesting. The performance is fantastic, price is great too. It is a unisex fragrance for sure, not feminine could lean masculine on someone. Try this one for sure<br />
<br />
Smell: 8/10<br />
Performance : 9.5/10<br />
Price : 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2206946"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2206946#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2206804" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205990" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Trench1419!"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169860"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2169860.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Trench1419!" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Myriad-85363.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85363.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Myriad"title="Myriad"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205990ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205990" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2169860">Trench1419!</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-02">07/02/24 10:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I've just been really getting into this hobby over the past few months, and Invictus Victory Elixir was the first bottle that I bought since then.  The funny part is that it's still one of my favorites that I own.  I really could have stopped there, and been happy lol I love the deep, sweet vanilla scent.  I love gourmands.  I use this stuff any time, any place.  It just works.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2205990"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2205990#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2204880" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2204880" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Mr. Melk"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1573004"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1573004.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Mr. Melk" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jacques-Fath/Vetiver-Gris-74683.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74683.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vetiver Gris"title="Vetiver Gris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2204880ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2204880" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1573004">Mr. Melk</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 11:32</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is an excellent litmus test to expose the snobs.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2204880"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2204880#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2201115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2201115" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="montee"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1221166"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1221166.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="montee" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Bond-No-9/Chinatown-1300.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1300.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Chinatown"title="Chinatown"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2201115ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2201115" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1221166">montee</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-27">06/27/24 10:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>SWEEEEEET sweet sweet. I get a strong hazelnut-like sweetness here, followed by a big dump of vanilla. I would classify this as a gourmand.<br />
<br />
Its a good scent but it has that thing with most paco rabanne scents for guys, a VERY large dose of youthful, sweet aromachemicals (ethyl maltol, ethyl vanillin, etc). This would make an amazing gift for a teen/young adult.<br />
<br />
Like most other paco rabanne scents, it lasts and projects well above average. So be aware not to overspray.<br />
<br />
If you dont like super sweet smells you definitely wont like this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2201115"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2201115#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2199373" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2196249" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="rsnero680"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2024694"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2024694.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="rsnero680" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2196249ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2196249" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); I can't say it smells bad, but it's very bland and just a bit too sweet. Not quite my style, but I like this better than a lot of the other vanilla bombs on the market.<br />
Performance is great, but the bottle feels kinda cheap and flimsy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2196249"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2196249#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2195466" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This makes me want to get rid of everything in my collection and just rock this masterpiece for life.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2195466"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2195466#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2190251" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2190251" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Aromaventure"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152922"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2152922.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Aromaventure" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2190251ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2190251" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2152922">Aromaventure</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-16">06/16/24 14:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Review of Invictus Victory Elixir by Paco Rabanne<br />
Rating:  (4.5/5)<br />
<br />
Introduction:<br />
Invictus Victory Elixir by Paco Rabanne is a bold and dynamic fragrance, representing a new pinnacle in the Invictus line. Launched as an intense and refined iteration, this scent is designed for those who seek a powerful and enduring olfactory experience. As a perfume connoisseur, I had the opportunity to explore this fragrance in-depth, and here are my thoughts.<br />
<br />
Presentation:<br />
The bottle design is striking, staying true to the Invictus lineage with a trophy-like shape that exudes confidence and victory. The dark, gradient bottle with gold accents hints at the luxurious and intense nature of the fragrance within.<br />
<br />
Scent Profile:<br />
<br />
Top Notes: The fragrance opens with a burst of fresh and invigorating grapefruit and pink pepper, creating an immediate sense of energy and excitement. The citrusy sharpness is perfectly balanced by the subtle spiciness, making for an alluring and captivating introduction.<br />
<br />
Heart Notes: As the top notes settle, the heart reveals a harmonious blend of lavender and geranium. The floral aspects are both soft and sophisticated, adding depth and complexity to the composition. This middle phase is where the fragrance begins to truly shine, offering a refined elegance that is both masculine and approachable.<br />
<br />
Base Notes: The dry down is where Invictus Victory Elixir sets itself apart. The richness of tonka bean, vanilla, and amber creates a warm and sensual base that lingers on the skin for hours. The addition of a salty marine accord provides a unique twist, adding an unexpected layer of freshness to the otherwise warm and sweet finish.<br />
<br />
Performance:<br />
Invictus Victory Elixir excels in longevity and sillage. The fragrance lasts an impressive 8-10 hours, making it suitable for long days and special occasions. Its projection is moderate to strong, ensuring you leave a lasting impression without overwhelming those around you.<br />
<br />
Versatility:<br />
While the intensity of Invictus Victory Elixir makes it more suitable for evening wear and special events, it can also be worn during the day in cooler weather. Its versatile nature allows it to transition seamlessly from professional settings to social gatherings, making it a valuable addition to any fragrance collection.<br />
<br />
Conclusion:<br />
Paco Rabanne's Invictus Victory Elixir is a masterful blend of freshness, warmth, and sophistication. It offers a balanced composition that appeals to those who appreciate bold and enduring fragrances. With its excellent performance and versatile scent profile, it stands out as a worthy addition to the Invictus line. Whether you are a long-time fan of the brand or new to the collection, Invictus Victory Elixir is sure to impress with its captivating and triumphant essence.<br />
<br />
Pros:<br />
<br />
Long-lasting with strong sillage<br />
Balanced and complex scent profile<br />
Versatile for various occasions<br />
<br />
Cons:<br />
<br />
Intensity might be too strong for those preferring subtle fragrances<br />
Premium pricing<br />
<br />
Overall, Invictus Victory Elixir is a commendable fragrance that lives up to its name, delivering a powerful and victorious olfactory experience.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2190251"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2190251#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2189691" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2189691" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MichaelHeit"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2167445"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2167445.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MichaelHeit" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2189691ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2189691" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2167445">MichaelHeit</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-15">06/15/24 23:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Really nice lasted even after washing hands. I would say its fine for summertime</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2189691"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2189691#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182177" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182177" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="HashimA9"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2159730"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="HashimA9" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182177ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182177" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2159730">HashimA9</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 12:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Mid. I bought this in 2023 April and it was great. However I bought it again in February and it was nowhere near as good as before. I thought maybe it could be too old or it could have turned bad so I returned it and bought a replacement. The replacement had also been terrible. The smell is alright but the performance is mid. This fragrance only lasts about 2 hours then becomes a skin-scent. <br />
<br />
Longevity 3.5/10<br />
Silliage 4/10<br />
The scent 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2182177"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2182177#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179112" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179112" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Yournotjohn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2133509"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2133509.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Yournotjohn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/CK-One-276.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.276.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="CK One"title="CK One"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179112ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179112" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2133509">Yournotjohn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 13:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This fragrance is basically the definition of unoriginal. Nothing special about this at all. When i smelt this in the mall I was very confused. Before I smelt this one, I smelt all the scandal and most of the le male collection and then smelt one other invictos and thought that the others at least had difference but this one is the most mundane and uninspired fragrance of all of them like cmon, another vainilla designer fragrance? At least the smell was nice I guess<br />
<br />
Another thing is just how low quality it felt when I picked up, it was a cool design but the plastic felt like the cheapest plastic in the whole world. But then the price is what gets me, 60 for 50ml! I know thats not a lot but its so unoriginal like you could some mntales for that price, or even get a scandal at that price. <br />
<br />
In summary - Totally unoriginal fragrance that feels low quality and is too expensive. <br />
<br />
Longevity 8/10 *<br />
Silliage 8/10<br />
The scent 5/10<br />
<br />
*based of reviews</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2179112"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2179112#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176372" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1276861">Milestone87</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-03">06/03/24 03:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Some People write its similiare to Le Beau Le parfum and yes but only a bit in the opening. I like this fragrance much much better than Le Beau and i will tell u why. This Fragrance stays Sweet vanillic and le beau is sweet and becomes green, Invictus elixir becaomes als more balsamic and has a dirty edge into it to become masculine, thats why i like Elixir much better, through all the fruitiness and greenes in le beau it becomes sour and thats the part i never liked in any fragrance. So if i have to say which from this both go with invictus. I didnt wanna make a comparison. Because i think this Fragrance is very Beautiful and very mass apealing. Its really a Masterpiece and the juice is at the right place in trophy because its a winner.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2176372"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2176372#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2176010" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2163242" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="highpinch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/997462"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.997462.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="highpinch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Alfred-Dunhill/Icon-Racing-Red-66057.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.66057.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Icon Racing Red"title="Icon Racing Red"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2163242ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2163242" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.85); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2155132" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jjames799"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178428"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="jjames799" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ralph-Lauren/Polo-Deep-Blue-Parfum-59650.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59650.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Polo Deep Blue Parfum"title="Polo Deep Blue Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2155132ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x0"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2155132" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1178428">jjames799</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-13">05/13/24 20:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I really don't like this one. The vanilla/coconut combo is done to the point you feel you could overdose on it. Throw in some darker chocolaty richness which really doesn't work for me - it's all just too in your face and completely synthetic from top to bottom. Plus there's a big powdery side to the fragrance right from the opening spray.<br />
<br />
If you don't like heavy gourmand vanilla and coconut based scents then this probably will be a bit too much. It's a scrubber but you live and learn.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2155132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2155132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153708" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2153708" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="handshake"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2127873"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2127873.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="handshake" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2153708ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2153708" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2127873">handshake</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-12">05/12/24 11:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A pitiful sillage - you will most probably be the only one who can smell the scent, and even if you overspray, the scent will make sure to avoid being noticed by any one other than you. Additionally, the noseblindedness this gives you at first is unreal, makes you feel like you got hit in temples on your head, leaving you with a permanent injury. <br />
As to the positive points, this is a great fragrance, the vanilla and pepper combination works wonderfully. This reminds me of the JPG Elixir in some way. This perfume is very strong and sweet, perfect for a hot summer day or an office autumn.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2153708"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2153708#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2153181" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; This smells divine, ladies love it so much it's so much so addicting for them. Great for summer nights and even cold nights! Aromatic, a bit spicy, creamy reminds of close to 1M elixir without the rose. 9.5/10! I get long lasting performance on this perfume too!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2151714"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2151714#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147768" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147768" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="willnpc40"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234823"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1234823.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="willnpc40" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Prada/Prada-L-Homme-39029.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.39029.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Prada L'Homme"title="Prada L'Homme"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147768ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147768" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1234823">willnpc40</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I like this, but it only lasts/projects about 3 hours for me, so others that say it lasts them all day, be aware that it might not for you. <br />
<br />
Also be aware that IMO you have to really like the way coconut smells to like this. It is VERY prominent and can be smelled from beginning to end. The vanilla is also present but more in the background, which is a real shame :(.<br />
<br />
Anyway, its good, but doesnt project long for me and I wish it has less coconut and more vanilla (its suppose to be the top note but isnt). <br />
<br />
6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2147768"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2147768#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147432" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2147432" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheodoreMnts"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1876922"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1876922.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheodoreMnts" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2147432ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2147432" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1876922">TheodoreMnts</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-06">05/06/24 09:20</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I prefer understated fragrances, but damn the fruity chocolatey with a hint of coconut aspect of this is really good. Although I didnt end up getting a bottle, Im glad I sold my decant of this to a friend and customer of mine. He ended up acquiring a 50ml sized one and is happier with his current collection to date. Probably the only Invictus flanker I like <br />
<br />
I just wanted to add the noseblindedness in this is iNSANEEE</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2147432"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2147432#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2147033" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I would love to smell this on a woman</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2147033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2147033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2146050" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2146050" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ApolloEyes7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1948857"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1948857.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ApolloEyes7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2146050ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2146050" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1948857">ApolloEyes7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-04">05/04/24 22:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have Al Wataniah Attar Al Wesal and I noticed similarities in the cool or "aromatic" notes. And Attar Al Wesal is said to be similar to JPG Ultramale, a cologne generally understood to be a winner! <br />
<br />
First I tried Invictus Victory EDP. It was different, but it didn't grab me! Later, I set out to try the blue Victory bottle being flashed. So when I smelled this one, I was like, yum! The vanilla mixed with the other notes, plus that funk, is awesome. I thought it would be a great compliment to my Gentleman EDP. Best part is the drydown. It's mainly a tri-note smell as only a few dominant notes hit you at a time, so compared to some other fragrances it hits kind of flat. But it has that deep funk similar to Invictus Victory EDP. This is the grabber, as it has that base, but is mixed with other notes to make it smell sweet, exotic, and playful. It also layers well with ginger or patchouli essential oils!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2146050"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2146050#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2143845" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Scent: 10/10. On my skin it smells like a vanilla ice cream with a coconut in the background. I'm not surprized why people are comparing this to JPG Le Beau Le Parfum, it is very similar though this doesn't even have coconut in the official notes. Because it is so similar to it, in my opinion you could wear this all year if you love it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2140204"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2140204#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2139306" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2134451" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Howsitgoing"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830747"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1830747.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Howsitgoing" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Armani-Code-Eau-de-Toilette-79263.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.79263.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Armani Code Eau de Toilette"title="Armani Code Eau de Toilette"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2134451ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2134451" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1830747">Howsitgoing</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-23">04/23/24 22:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have JPG le beau and this most definitely has similar vibes but darker and richer. Overall its a like for me. 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2134451"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2134451#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2133056" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2133056" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mehrdad"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/28570"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.28570.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mehrdad" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2133056ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2133056" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/28570">mehrdad</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-22">04/22/24 15:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p> <br />
             .<br />
              .<br />
            .<br />
                   .<br />
                  .<br />
  <br />
     <br />
    <br />
 <br />
        10    10   .<br />
                     .<br />
                                 .<br />
                            .<br />
    <br />
 <br />
Greetings<br />
Inoctus Elixir is a very sweet and warm perfume, but really fragrant and very hearty.<br />
Its sweetness is not tired at all and has very good durability and spread.<br />
It is also suitable for parties, work environment and daily use.<br />
For me, who enjoys warm and sweet scents, it is considered a wonderful and good work.<br />
Dear ladies, as far as I have tested, they are completely satisfied with smelling it and they like it.<br />
Masculine and attractive<br />
Sweet and warm but harmless<br />
Excellent playback and durability<br />
Pleasant aroma<br />
I give it a score of 10 out of 10 for its fragrance and durability.<br />
An explosion of cardamom, vanilla, and lavender aromas along with the aforementioned ingredients creates a good balance.<br />
It takes away from us.<br />
With respect and courtesy</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2133056"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2133056#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2128649" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1688046">Jaben4Real</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-04">04/04/24 21:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Imagine you decide to bake some sugar cookies. You make the dough, go through the steps. Get ready to put them in the oven and think, maybe these would be better with a little something extra So you can glance into your cabinet and grab the first thing you see that works. And its coconut shavings. So you cram some coconut shavings in the dough and throw those coconut sugar cookies into the oven. 25 minutes later you hear the oven ding, you open it up and BAM Victory Elixir. <br />
<br />
Thats how it smells.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2114702"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2114702#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2110318" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2072255">Chickens are Cool</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-25">03/25/24 20:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This Invictus Victory Elixir smells very nice and is very popular in young teens. It has a tangy vanilla flavour and it is widely favourited.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2104260"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2104260#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2103175" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2103175" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yamin.100s"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815016"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1815016.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yamin.100s" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Interlude-Black-Iris-60929.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.60929.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Interlude Black Iris"title="Interlude Black Iris"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2103175ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2103175" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1815016">yamin.100s</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-24">03/24/24 20:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Perfect scent for a summers night in the mediterranean <br />
<br />
Amber/vanilla combo are the main players here. Also get a very strong hint of coconut even though its not a listed note. In fact everyone that smelt this on me always assumes it has coconut in it too. A term to describe this fragrance perfectly is exotic  smelling.<br />
<br />
This stuff is so strong the longevity is the main strength of this fragrance. I avoid spraying this on clothes because it just doesnt come off. Can get very cloying and sickeningly sweet if over-sprayed. You only need 3 sprays maximum. <br />
<br />
Its a very unique smelling perfume and in my opinion its very limited for its wearability. I think this can be worn all seasons other than autumn and spring. I also believe this is better suited for night time use than day time.<br />
<br />
Can see why this compares to le beau le parfum but if you want a much stronger and more unique take , choose this. <br />
<br />
Age range i believe is anyone 15-25. I feel like anyone above this wouldnt suit it much as its too sweet and youthful. Nothing masculine or mature about this much.<br />
<br />
Price - 8/10 ( you only need a 50ml because of how potent this is)<br />
<br />
Scent - 7/10<br />
<br />
Longevity - 20/10<br />
<br />
Sillage - 9/10<br />
<br />
Projection - 9/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2103175"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2103175#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2101170" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2101170" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lidor"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579960"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lidor" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jean-Paul-Gaultier/Scandal-Pour-Homme-Le-Parfum-74915.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.74915.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"title="Scandal Pour Homme Le Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2101170ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2101170" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1579960">lidor</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-22">03/22/24 18:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A slightly spicy ambery vanilla fragrance with great performance and smell.<br />
<br />
Scent:8.5<br />
Projection/Longevity:8<br />
Uniqueness:7<br />
quality:8.5<br />
Value for money:ok<br />
<br />
Overall:8</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2101170"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2101170#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2100552" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2100552" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Ihaggins"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308549"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1308549.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Ihaggins" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Xerjoff/More-Than-Words-16450.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.16450.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="More Than Words"title="More Than Words"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2100552ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2100552" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1308549">Ihaggins</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-22">03/22/24 06:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Want to make eyes roll to the heavens when you pass by? Layer this under Blackmail by Kerosene. The touch of black berries and incense blend so well with the warm accords of Victory Elixir. Invictus is a stunner on its own, but if youre aiming for a bit more mystery and depth layering Blackmail over it does it in spades. Victory Elixir is a heavy projector. So it helps push Blackmail out because otherwise its thicker  and tends to perform like a Parfum concentration that lasts a long time, yielding great sillage, yet sits closer to the skin. The two play extremely well together giving me the best of both worlds. The mass appeal aspect from a great designer release, coupled with the depth and mystery of an underground niche fragrance. <br />
<br />
9.5/10 - Victory Elixir on its own<br />
30/10 - Victory Elixir layered with Blackmail - off the charts! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2100552"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2100552#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2100270" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; The sillage is nice and strong with way more than enough hours of longevity. It smells like vanilla, a little fresh fruity sweetness and a sprinkle of something a little masculine. Incredible for winter, and could maybe pull it off in the summer. Brilliant fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2099136"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2099136#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2096302" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1812807">Tahsinss</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-18">03/18/24 10:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>got this for my father today, fantastic fragrance. It doesnt get any more mass appealing than this. Looking at the notes, you might think that its a spicy fragrance but the spice level is very very low. It is a warm vanilla and amber fragrance with some nice notes in the background. The combination of the amber and the vanilla is beautiful.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2096302"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2096302#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2095397" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2095341" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lewishanley100"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2061168"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="lewishanley100" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2095341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2095341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2061168">lewishanley100</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-17">03/17/24 10:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>10/10 for me. Some could find it overly sweet with the vanilla, amber and a bit of caramel maybe, not too sure.<br />
<br />
compared it to LBLPF and it lasts about 3 hours more on me and projects more however I slightly prefer le beau dna to this, nonetheless, it is a very good fragrance.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2095341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2095341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2095293" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2095293" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fortyfree"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1631067.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fortyfree" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2095293ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2095293" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1631067">Fortyfree</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-17">03/17/24 09:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet, modern, vanilla.<br />
<br />
Opens sweet with a nutty aroma.<br />
Freshens, turns a little blue, maybe some ambroxan?<br />
Has a little bit of spice, gets sweeter.<br />
Is a little aquatic. <br />
Has a caramel note too.<br />
The base is clean and vanilla heavy. Plenty of clean musk on the skin. <br />
<br />
Youthful fragrance 15-30, cooler weather. Office safe. <br />
<br />
Performance decent, projection is good and it lasts a long time on the skin. <br />
<br />
It's a pleasing modern fragrance, however it reminds me of a lot of other modern sweet vanilla scents, so (and this may be because I've tried so many already this year) comes off a little underwhelming...it's nice, just not original.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2095293"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2095293#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2095168" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It takes the DNA from le beau, 1 million elixir, and scandal, and adds this sort of warm freshness with the addition of resinous incense and black pepper. I have a 20ml travel spray of this which I am going through quickly, but I do not plan on buying a full bottle because of its similarities with scents I already own.
