padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2087591" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Parker84"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2010666"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2010666.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Parker84" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Gentleman-Eau-de-Toilette-Intense-65051.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.65051.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentleman Eau de Toilette Intense"title="Gentleman Eau de Toilette Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2087591ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2087591" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.74); padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2077734" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MngoTango2021"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1413201"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="MngoTango2021" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2077734ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2077734" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1413201">MngoTango2021</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-29">02/29/24 06:04</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Wearing it right now, as I just got a bottle, based on reviews. Not a fan. I'm getting an over ripe, almost nauseating over sweet <br />
 balsamic pineapple with a coconut note. Definitely getting pepper. The pepper totally out weighs the patchouli. It's honestly, in my opinion, a mess. My least favorite of the line.<br />
<br />
I'm going to the gym now, so we'll see if anyone compliments me, but I would say this is more similar to Jean Paul Gaultier's Le Beau Parfum, but not nearly as good. The Le Beau Parfum is MUCH better. Also has a little Scandal edt about it.  Just get either the Le Beau Parfum or Scandal if you want this type of scent profile. They are more decisive about what they are trying to be. This is a bit of a mess. We'll see how it progresses as the day goes on, and I'll update later. But I would not blind buy this one like I have.  The regular Invictus Victory is much better, even though it isn't my favorite either.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2077734"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2077734#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2077580" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2073909" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JaySentz"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995085"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1995085.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JaySentz" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Memo-Paris/African-Leather-31383.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31383.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="African Leather"title="African Leather"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2073909ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2073909" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1995085">JaySentz</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-25">02/25/24 14:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was really surprised to not see pineapple or coconut listed in the notes when I checked here. I guess only some people are getting that depending on sensitivity or interpretation, but next to other pineapple scents like Honor and Glory it 100% has a pineapple like accord. I get pia colada vibes with lavender and spice making it smell less gourmand. I think everyone can agree it is sweet and appealing.<br />
<br />
Delicious scent that I put down for a full bottle shortly after I sampled it. Could be used in warmer weather with less sprays because of that tropical vibe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2073909"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2073909#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073171" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2073171" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Thiagofsleumer"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1982466"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1982466.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Thiagofsleumer" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2073171ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2073171" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1982466">Thiagofsleumer</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-24">02/24/24 19:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Essa  minha primeira resenha, ento serei breve.<br />
O victory abre bem pungente ao meu olfato, com um cardamomo misturado com pimenta bem refrescante. Sinto a lavanda dando um frescor a mais, mas ela no  a nota principal de sada. O perfume evolui com um incenso abaunilhado delicioso, juntamente com uma fava tonka que d uma certa cremosidade na secagem. <br />
<br />
Penso que diferente do seu irmo, o victory tradicional, o elixir  mais sbrio, acho que caberia melhor pra pessoas com mais de 25 anos.<br />
<br />
Projeo de 2h e fixao de umas 8 10 hrs em minha pele, uma bombinha. Muita qualidade, chega a ser absurdo o que Paco Rabanne fez aqui.<br />
<br />
No recomendo o blind pelo incenso presente, que pode incomodar alguns olfatos.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2073171"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2073171#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2073160" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2073160" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jayb_9402"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2022492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2022492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jayb_9402" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2073160ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2073160" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2022492">Jayb_9402</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-24">02/24/24 19:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>If you love a heavy yet soothing vanilla fragrance, this one is fs a recommendation from me. When I first smell this, the vanilla is dominant, and the mint and pepper back it up to give it a soothing yet noticeable kick. The dry down is lovely as well, the incense and tonka bean notes give it a hook. Don't really get the hate behind this one, I love it! A little strong though, just don't overspray and this smells LOVELY.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2073160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2073160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2070299" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Lasts days on clothes and 10 hours on skin. I like the lavender note better on the new Boss The Scent Elixir. Overall it's a good and very safe buy. Projects very hard. Mass appealing frag, which I like.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2070299"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2070299#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068612" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2065409" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Detman101"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1374575.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Detman101" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Jasoor-85093.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.85093.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Jasoor"title="Jasoor"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2065409ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2065409" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1374575">Detman101</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-17">02/17/24 14:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received this today, wearing it for the first time.<br />
Definitely over-sprayed not knowing how powerful this is....yeesh, big mistake.<br />
This is pure nuclear level coconut-vanilla on me somehow....<br />
No other notes detectable...and Coconut isn't even in it??? <br />
What am I smelling? Is the Ethyl-Maltol killing my senses?<br />
I might use this as an accent to my "Vetiver &amp; Golden Vanilla" and "Red Tobacco"...I can't see wearing this a second time alone.<br />
This is like the sugary whipped cream on top of a more serious hot drink. <br />
Though the strength, projection and longevity are beyond serious...I can't really take this fragrance seriously.<br />
Definitely prefer "Victory" more for a solo/everyday fragrance.<br />
This one is just a sweet topper...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2065409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2065409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058127" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2058127" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="genec123"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1721082"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1721082.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="genec123" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Marc-Antoine-Barrois/Ganymede-54720.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.54720.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ganymede"title="Ganymede"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2058127ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2058127" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1721082">genec123</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-10">02/10/24 10:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>(Read till the end) I've smelled this on multiple occasions, and thought "eh"<br />
Now just yesterday I tried it on again. The cashier from 5 feet away granted I was standing there a while, asked the girl in front of him if she was wearing perfume. I said "that's me"<br />
He said "wow, that smells amazing. It is really strong" (granted I did like 10 sprays since last times I used it it seemed to fade very fast)<br />
<br />
This is 60% masculine, sweet, vanilla, coconut, ambery and I still smell it strongly on my shirt 18 hours ago.<br />
It is so good. 5 stars. I'll be getting a 6.8 ounce</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2058127"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2058127#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058115" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Love the way it smells and is easily one of my most complimented fragrances. If you are looking to get positive attention this might be the one youve been looking for. padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2035226" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="torreykongjr"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541728"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1541728.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="torreykongjr" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2035226ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2035226" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1541728">torreykongjr</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 21:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>High nutty fruity sweetness, powdery maybe smoky. Thats all I really get from this. Eros type scent and I have love for them. About as strong as department store parfum gets these days. I wore this to my doctors office and two different employees said I smelled good, one of them 6ft away haha. Through their  mask they smelled me its that loud! Stays with you and projects for many hours, sticks to fabrics easily.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2035226"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2035226#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2035083" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2035083" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Timyoungn304"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218816"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1218816.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Timyoungn304" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Giorgio-Armani/Acqua-di-Gio-Eau-de-Parfum-71606.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71606.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Acqua di Gi Eau de Parfum"title="Acqua di Gi Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2035083ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2035083" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1218816">Timyoungn304</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-18">01/18/24 17:27</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>OH MY Fn GOD!!! Possibly one of the best releases of the year (2023). After getting a sample from Macys I knew I had to own a full bottle. Found a 200 mL on Mercari for $102. Paco knocked this out of the park and then some. Performance is amazing! Longevity, projection, sillage it has it all. The fact this stuff doesnt have coconut listed in the notes blows mind.. Im not sure what notes are mixed together to create the tropical coconut smell but I like it. Definitely smells like le beau parfum so if you own it this will be redundant. <br />
<br />
Im looking to maybe swap some of this for Montale fougere marine if anyone is interested. Id like to swap at least 15 mL</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2035083"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2035083#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2034537" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Fragrance itself is a compliment magnet in the office or wherever really. 5/5 fragrance for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2034537"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2034537#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033593" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's a super nice vanilla fragrance with a hint of something fruity. The longevity and projection on this thing is very good, stays on my skin for 10+ hours and projects for like 6 hours. People compare it to le beau le parfum, but for me they are completely different fragrances. Would give it a strong 8.5 out of 10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2033593"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2033593#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2033479" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1949055">Hampson</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-09">01/09/24 11:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very nice smelling Cologne. Would love it to last longer, I get around 6hrs from it. You can wear this anytime, however evening, winter will be best</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2025590"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2025590#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2018750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2018750" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="NckBlossom"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566746"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1566746.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="NckBlossom" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Versace/Eros-Energy-92647.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92647.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eros Energy"title="Eros Energy"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2018750ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2018750" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1566746">NckBlossom</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-03">01/03/24 07:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The dry down of This is joop homme wild.. all Im gettin is this peppery rum accorda lot cheaper as well and nobody will notice the difference. Redundant to own both imo. Opening very unisex too</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2018750"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2018750#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2015744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2015744" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="drewsneak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309965"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1309965.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="drewsneak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2015744ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2015744" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309965">drewsneak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-30">12/30/23 20:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As I tore through the Christmas wrapping paper, I was then holding a Paco Rabanne gift set that my mom had picked out for me. I was delighted as I am a fraghead and always appreciate some cologne  <br />
<br />
I opened the box it came in and lo and behold, I was introduced to Victory Elixir! FIRST IMPRESSION: the bottle looks NICE  (I especially like the blue undertone). This scent was not on my radar at all as I dont really care for the Invictus line so I was surprised and intrigued to smell what my mom had picked out for me.<br />
<br />
FIRST SPRAY: Immediately got a whiff of coconut , like the one in JPG Le Beau Le Parfum, and I don't even like coconut!  but this  was much more rounded and smoother (which makes sense considering the notes listed on here) and made it suitably nice for my nose. A bit sweet but not too sweet and I can definitely smell the Invictus DNA in the background, making it an inviting scent.<br />
<br />
This is also when my mom realizes that they gave her the wrong gift set and this was not the scent that she had picked out!  (she says VE is too sweet but doesnt remember which bottle she sampled)<br />
I thanked her anyways and gave her a hug. <br />
<br />
DRYDOWN is smokey and vanilla, nothing special but pleasant nonetheless. Kind of reminds me of Valentino but I dont like how the patchouli smells in Valentino. Paco Rabanne must have heard me from the grave because <br />
<br />
PERFORMANCE IS BEAST  <br />
<br />
In conclusion, Invictus Victory Elixir is a great scent, suitable for all ages, has versatility, and should not be slept on. It has found its place unexpectedly in my collection and is a blind reach for sure! Even my 10 year old son loves it!!<br />
<br />
4/5<br />
<br />
THANKS MOM! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2015744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2015744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2012840" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2009515"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2009515#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2005731" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2005731" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RogueZXRO"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330655"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1330655.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="RogueZXRO" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-2020-58714.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58714.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme 2020"title="Dior Homme 2020"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2005731ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2005731" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1330655">RogueZXRO</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-19">12/19/23 20:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Reminds me of those Danish butter cookies. Sweet addictive gourmand smell. I was not sure if I would enjoy this scent due to disliking victory but I was pleasantly surprised at how good this smells. A big improvement from its predecessor!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2005731"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2005731#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2004772" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2004772" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="St.0cky"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927431"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1927431.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="St.0cky" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2004772ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2004772" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1927431">St.0cky</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-18">12/18/23 18:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received my bottle today.  As expected, I am not disappointed.  <br />
<br />
Victory elixir starts off strong, its a vanilla coconut blast, but in a good way.  <br />
There is a subtle pina colada vibe.  Even though there is clearly no pineapple or coconut in the notes, for me I do get a small tinge of it.  <br />
<br />
This fragrance is definitely strong.  I put it on about 5 hours ago and it is still projecting a lot.  Not too sure about what kind of sillage but Id presume its solid.  Not sure how people gauge their own sillage tbh.  <br />
<br />
The dry down is pleasant, the sweetness falls back a bit but is still there.  This is a masculine scent to me.  <br />
<br />
Overall, I feel like victory elixir is a fantastic value.  I got my 100ml for $75 and free shipping.  For its quality I have no complaints.  I wouldnt put this ahead of other quality frags that I have but again, its price point makes this a great purchase for anyone.  It is versatile and can be worn for most of the year, in warmer weather just keep the sprays minimal.  Its a safe pleasant scent that wont upset anyone.  Work, school, running errands..it all fits. Id say it leans towards the younger guys.  <br />
<br />
If you are looking for a unique smelling niche frag then this isnt it.  But its a solid mass appealing frag.  <br />
<br />
Scent - 8.0/10<br />
Projection - 8.5/10<br />
Longevity - 8.5/10<br />
Price - 9.5/10<br />
<br />
Overall I give it a 8.5.  Definitely worth checking out!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2004772"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2004772#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2004274" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2004274" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Marxwick"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1261083.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Marxwick" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Hermes/Hermessence-Ambre-Narguile-2669.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.2669.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"title="Hermessence Ambre Narguile"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2004274ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2004274" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1261083">Marxwick</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-18">12/18/23 08:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>It is an easy-going sweet, vanilla, and tonka bean scent that smells like Le Beau Le Parfum.<br />
I don't get the Invictus Victory or Scandal Le Parfum DNA in this.<br />
The longevity and projection are good.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2004274"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2004274#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2000812" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1105584">andrewg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 22:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sampled only once today and it smells similar to 1 Million Lucky!  It's stronger and not as smooth maybe a little more loud better for parties or outdoor events.  To me it's a hybrid of 1 Million Lucky and Armani Code Absolu. I will sample a few more times but nevertheless pretty good.  <br />
<br />
<br />
Rating: 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="1995568"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=1995568#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1995165" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:4,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1995165" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kristianivanm"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523083"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1523083.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kristianivanm" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1995165ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1995165" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523083">kristianivanm</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-07">12/07/23 12:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Had this one on my radar since it's release and I finally have it my possession. My first elixir and worth the wait!<br />
<br />
I would agree with the comments saying it's not anything groundbreaking or new but I do think it's unique in it's own way. It follows the already done fresh/sweet/smokey route, but it does it so well. Almost exceptional to warrant it's purchase. <br />
<br />
Opens up almost crunchy sugary if that makes sense. Like if you had sugar crystals crunched between your teeth (and I don't think that's a bad thing in this fragrance). Waxy-ish(cardamom)/peppery/tropical from the initial notes then dries down to a smokey/indulgently sweet body. I almost get a chocolate note as well. Unapologetically loud and sweet but maintains it's masculinity.<br />
<br />
Wears strong and projects far. The box claims that it's long-lasting, and it's true. Applied a couple sprays before bed for test and the scent was still there in the morning (8ish hrs). Obviously not as intense as initial sprays but still noticeable. Tried a spray on my hands as well and it still clung onto skin even after washing my hands.<br />
<br />
Appropriate wear all through the cooler seasons but the tropical vibes would make me want to wear this on a cool summer night. Leans casual and nocturnal. Maybe mid 20's and on. Overall a great addition to my collection!<br />
<br />
Edit 5/3/24: This stuff is nuclear after it's been sitting awhile. Worth the money!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="1995165"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=1995165#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1993616" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1993616" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="seldomseen"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067640"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1067640.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="seldomseen" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Givenchy/Gentleman-Eau-de-Parfum-Reserve-Privee-71272.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.71272.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gentleman Eau de Parfum Reserve Prive"title="Gentleman Eau de Parfum Reserve Prive"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1993616ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1993616" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1067640">seldomseen</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-05">12/05/23 22:12</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Victory Elixir isn't anything ground breaking and is more hype than reality.  However, the minor differences does make VE a much better smelling, more refined, and mature fragrance than Victory (OG). <br />
<br />
While VE may not be a certified, licensed, registered crowd pleaser. It definitely will not be an offensive fragrance, and can be most every situation and year round if one chooses to do so. VE can easily serve as a signature scent or a daily dumb reach. VE will clearly appeal to guys of all ages, but may be better suited for the under 30 crowd due to VE playful and sweet mass-appealing nature. <br />
<br />
Performance on VE is consistent with other designer Elixirs. Long lasting (12+ hours) with moderate/average/okay projection.  I will say that VE isn't quite retail priced worthy -- especially for collectors or those will minimal financial resources. However, VE may feel like it's worth the price of owning if you can get it at 15% - 50% less than it's steep retail price.  <br />
<br />
Overall: 7.5/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="1993616"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=1993616#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="78575" sentiment="all"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent2015744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2015744" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="drewsneak"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309965"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1309965.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="drewsneak" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2015744ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2015744" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309965">drewsneak</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-30">12/30/23 20:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>As I tore through the Christmas wrapping paper, I was then holding a Paco Rabanne gift set that my mom had picked out for me. I was delighted as I am a fraghead and always appreciate some cologne  <br />
<br />
I opened the box it came in and lo and behold, I was introduced to Victory Elixir! FIRST IMPRESSION: the bottle looks NICE  (I especially like the blue undertone). This scent was not on my radar at all as I dont really care for the Invictus line so I was surprised and intrigued to smell what my mom had picked out for me.<br />
<br />
FIRST SPRAY: Immediately got a whiff of coconut , like the one in JPG Le Beau Le Parfum, and I don't even like coconut!  but this  was much more rounded and smoother (which makes sense considering the notes listed on here) and made it suitably nice for my nose. A bit sweet but not too sweet and I can definitely smell the Invictus DNA in the background, making it an inviting scent.<br />
<br />
This is also when my mom realizes that they gave her the wrong gift set and this was not the scent that she had picked out!  (she says VE is too sweet but doesnt remember which bottle she sampled)<br />
I thanked her anyways and gave her a hug. <br />
<br />
DRYDOWN is smokey and vanilla, nothing special but pleasant nonetheless. Kind of reminds me of Valentino but I dont like how the patchouli smells in Valentino. Paco Rabanne must have heard me from the grave because <br />
<br />
PERFORMANCE IS BEAST  <br />
<br />
In conclusion, Invictus Victory Elixir is a great scent, suitable for all ages, has versatility, and should not be slept on. It has found its place unexpectedly in my collection and is a blind reach for sure! Even my 10 year old son loves it!!<br />
<br />
4/5<br />
<br />
THANKS MOM! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2015744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2015744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1749132" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1749132" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Rotten Rebel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327902"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1327902.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Rotten Rebel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1749132ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1749132" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1327902">Rotten Rebel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-01">02/01/23 12:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I made a First Impression of it on my youtube channel.<br />
<br />
This is another excellent release in the Invictus line of men's fragrances. Parts of it remind me of the original, but it's its spiciness is softer than the OG, it's got a nice aromatic touch to it and the dry down is a bit less sweet but actually more exciting than the original with some new notes to it.<br />
<br />
If you really sniff your way through the dry down you can pick up some nuances that separate it from some similar scents. Sure it's nothing groundbreaking, but it smells great and most people are definitely going to enjoy getting a whiff of it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="1749132"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=1749132#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1854022" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1854022" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nelsongil13"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1030706"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1030706.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="nelsongil13" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Sauvage-Eau-de-Parfum-48100.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.48100.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"title="Sauvage Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1854022ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1854022" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1030706">nelsongil13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-06-11">06/11/23 09:42</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Invictus Victory Elixir  by Paco Rabanne <br />
<br />
THE BOTTLE is remarkable : (Reminds me the UEFA Champions League TROPHY ) and its dark blue tone is stunning. <br />
<br />
I find this one the less synthetic of the saga. <br />
The opening is a bit similar to the VICTORY OG without the  peppery and smoky notes but some nuttiness and overwhelming SWEET. <br />
<br />
Vanilla? Yes! But not the  Creamy and Milky vibe that is expected in this type of pyramid notes, this one is a delightful  TROPICAL/JUICY and Coconut-ish accord.<br />
<br />
 Is it a money grabber? Definitely but wow! smells FREAKING AMAZING. <br />
Its a compliments galore and the PERFORMANCE is insane. <br />
<br />
Cool weather, Joyful, juvenile and a Swiss knife at the lounge, bars and night out parties. <br />
<br />
Well done Paco!<br />
<br />
Rate: </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="1854022"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=1854022#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1889171" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;     <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1760671" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1760671" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Fazh97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274841"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Fazh97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1760671ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1760671" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1274841">Fazh97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-02-15">02/15/23 09:37</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just another super generic sugar bomb. The original invictus victory had some interesting dark notes that made it way more interesting than the rest of the line,  this on the other hand follows the trend of scents like phantom, seeing how much sweetness they can get away with in one bottle. Gross unless you like that kind of thing, and if you do nothing in this stands out from that category of modern fragrances.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="1760671"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=1760671#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2090984" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2090984" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elqxir"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2052415"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elqxir" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Axis/Axis-Caviar-Ultimate-23213.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.23213.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Axis Caviar Ultimate"title="Axis Caviar Ultimate"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2090984ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2090984" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);
