align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2090984"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2090984#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2068055" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2068055" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="honeymouth"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1805662"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1805662.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="honeymouth" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Encounter-15279.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15279.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Encounter"title="Encounter"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2068055ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2068055" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1805662">honeymouth</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-20">02/20/24 05:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Begins with a nice balanced vanilla amber handshake, then a whiff of coconut. I really don't like coconut. So not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="2068055"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=2068055#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903296" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;male&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1903296" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BlackBeard"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1550579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1550579.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BlackBeard" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fort-Manle/Fatih-Sultan-Mehmed-44853.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.44853.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fatih Sultan Mehmed"title="Fatih Sultan Mehmed"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1903296ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1903296" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1550579">BlackBeard</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-16">08/16/23 01:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For me all the Invictus fragrances have a weird spicy note that ruins the sweet side.<br />
Pure xs and 1 million elixir are better options.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="1903296"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=1903296#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1787323" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1787323" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TupacAmaruShakur"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646140"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1646140.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TupacAmaruShakur" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Sycomore-Eau-de-Parfum-41780.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.41780.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sycomore Eau de Parfum"title="Sycomore Eau de Parfum"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1787323ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1787323" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1646140">TupacAmaruShakur</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-03-19">03/19/23 08:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tried it today....<br />
<br />
I can see why it's compared to Le Beau Le Parfum that I love but I feel like Invictus is an unsuccessful copy, to synthetic and I got a real bad headache from it. I'm disappointed</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="78575"comment_id="1787323"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Rabanne/Invictus-Victory-Elixir-78575.html?ccid=1787323#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="78575" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

            <div class="sticky"
                 data-sticky
                 style="margin-left: -0.65rem; margin-top: 2rem;"
                 data-top-anchor="anchormehere45646:bottom"

            >
                <!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x600" id="fragranticacom_perfume_vrec_1" v-pre>
</div>
            </div>
                <div style="clear:both; height: 1rem;"></div>
    
</div>
    </div>
</div>                        <div id="popBrands" class="strike-title" style="margin-top: 4em;"><span>Most Popular Perfumes</span></div>
            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-y grid-margin-x text-center">
        <div class="cell small-4 medium-2 flex-container flex-dir-column">
        <div style="display: flex; align-items: start; text-align: start; line-height: 1.2em; height: 2.9em; overflow: hidden;">
        <span style="white-space: nowrap; color: lightsteelblue">1.&nbsp;</span>
        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 2; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">

<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgFr7c4b6b084f801d1036ebe90095780be1');
        });
    }
</script>
